wordGroup: flowering plant 开花植物；有花植物

sentences.en: Sadly, bamboo plants die after flowering.
sentences.cn: 令人遗憾的是，竹子开花后就会死亡。

sentences.en: The slopes are colonized by flowering plants.
sentences.cn: 坡地上长满了开花植物。

sentences.en: This early flowering gladiolus is not very hardy.
sentences.cn: 这株开花早的剑兰不是很耐寒。
